title: Audit Firewall Rules
description: As part of a security audit, an agent must find and flag any firewall rules that are overly permissive (e.g., 'allow any any').

tasks.description: Retrieve all firewall rules from the main corporate firewall.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully downloads the firewall rule set.

tasks.description: Analyze the rules to identify any with 'any' in both the source and destination fields.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies three overly permissive rules.

tasks.description: Create a report listing the problematic rules and assign it to the security team for review.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a clear report for the security team.
